text: The 1991 Vuelta a España was the 46th edition of the Vuelta a España, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Vuelta began in Mérida, with an individual time trial on 29 April, and Stage 10 occurred on 8 May with a stage to Andorra la Vella. The race finished in Madrid on 19 May. ==Stage 1== 29 April 1991 — Mérida to Mérida, (TTT) {| |Stage 1 result and general classification after Stage 1 {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider !
